snippet: Shares in the maker of Marlboro cigarettes rallied, as it sold more cigarettes at higher prices, especially in Europe.
abstract: Philip Morris International raises full-year profit forecast in light of sales growth; shares rise 8.7 percent on news.
lead_paragraph: Shares in the maker of Marlboro cigarettes rallied, as it sold more cigarettes at higher prices, especially in Europe.

headline.main: Philip Morris International Raises Profit Forecast for Year
headline.print_headline: Philip Morris International Raises Forecast for Full Year
